mapper.select: select sp.*, product.name product_name, product.scale product_scale, product.product_index product_index from ent_store_price sp, ent_product product where sp.sys_status = 1 and product.sys_status = 1 and sp.product_id = product.id and sp.store_id = #{id} order by product.product_index

select store.*, line.name line from ent_store store, ent_line line where store.sys_status = 1 and line.sys_status = 1 and store.line_id = line.id
and concat(store.store_name,store.store_holder,store.address,store.phone,store.line) like "%${keyword}%"
order by if(isnull(store.modified_time),0,store.modified_time) desc,store.created_time desc
select store.*, line.name line from ent_store store, ent_line line where store.sys_status = 1 and line.sys_status = 1 and store.line_id = line.id and store.id = #{id}
select store.* from ent_store store where store.sys_status = 1 and store.line_id = #{line_id} order by if(isnull(store.modified_time),0,store.modified_time) desc,store.created_time desc
mapper.insert: insert into ent_store ( id, store_name, store_holder, address, phone, line_id, remarks, creator_id, created_time, modified_time ) values ( #{id}, #{store_name}, #{store_holder}, #{address}, #{phone}, #{line_id}, #{remarks}, #{creator_id}, now(), now() )
mapper.update: update ent_store set store_name = #{store_name}, store_holder = #{store_holder}, address = #{address}, phone = #{phone}, line_id = #{line_id}, remarks = #{remarks} , modifier_id = #{modifier_id} , modified_time = now() where id = #{id}
mapper.delete: update ent_store set sys_status = 0, modifier_id = #{modifier_id}, modified_time = now() where id=#{id}
mapper.insert: insert into ent_store_price ( id, store_id, product_id, unit_price, remarks, creator_id, created_time, modified_time ) values ( uuid(), #{store_id}, #{product_id}, #{unit_price}, #{remarks}, #{creator_id}, now(), now() )
mapper.update: update ent_store_price set unit_price = #{unit_price}, remarks = #{remarks} , modifier_id = #{modifier_id} , modified_time = now() where id = #{id}
update ent_store_price set sys_status = 0, modified_time = now() where store_id = #{store_id}
